name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: Old Navy has announced plans to open 60 more stores this year. This is great news for guys who say, "I love khakis, but I just wish they fell apart faster."

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: The internet erupted after Melania Trump was photographed wearing a Beyoncé-style hat. And, just like Beyoncé, Melania is recording an album about her cheating husband.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: When French President Emmanuel Macron greeted President Trump, he kissed Trump on both cheeks. Then out of habit, Michael Cohen showed up and handed Macron $130,000.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: White House physician Dr. Ronny Jackson has been accused of drinking on the job. Today, Jackson defended himself saying, "You’d drink too if you saw Donald Trump naked."
